column4: just wondering is there a better plugin for WMV than the default totem plugin?
on firefox
have you tried the mediaplayer connectivity plugin for firefox?
i dont need info on the media repository i'm mearly asking for an opinion
i just relized that
yeah i use the basic totem plugin, i've tried the vlc on it doesn't seem to work, i was just wondering if they snuck a superior one in ther and i didn't notice
what about mplayer?
it works for me
i'll try that
ok, good luck with it
when i used vlc a couple times before i didn't have sound
yeah its funky
i just want something that actualy lets me skip content without breaking
but i use mediaplayer connectivity plugin for firefox and i can choose which player i want to use, obf213

is it in the repos

im not sure if its in synaptic
ok
thanks so much for this plugin. vlc works much better than the vlc plugin and i can skip back and forth in the stream
no problem
